document.full_text: the u.s. raid that killed osama bin laden could have a significant impact on the afghan insurgency, delivering both a psychological and intelligence blow to taliban leaders and foot soldiers alike, a top u.s. marine corps general said on thursday.
document.title: bin laden raid a blow to afghan taliban: u.s. general
lines_and_colors: the u.s. raid that killed osama bin laden could have a significant impact on the afghan insurgency, delivering both a psychological and intelligence blow to taliban leaders and foot soldiers alike, a top u.s. marine corps general said on thursday.
